---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/avalanche/delegate/get-flow-status-completed
pagination_next: null
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://avalanche-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/ffa614e2-b50c-4d97-9e9d-de2a0413e363' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `delegate_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "ffa614e2-b50c-4d97-9e9d-de2a0413e363",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "P-fuji10vk9enj4xg3u3a2e4nt47plc66fzq2hwgwgma3",
    "validator_address": "NodeID-BGrjjjfPCWR6pGWNTN7YcW1XtUKofMQsL",
    "amount": "2.0",
    "start_time": null,
    "end_time": null,
    "memo": null,
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": null,
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2aJkc7U3BJzcPXXm5uR9sKjeEaRfaAnhsmoFujCYnZCEbe19RD",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "avalanche",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-27T21:34:47.579Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-27T21:36:15.469Z"
}
```

### Delegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, your delegation is now active and earning rewards!
